Quill Rich Text Editor

Quill is a free, open source WYSIWYG editor built for the modern web. With its modular architecture and expressive API, it is completely customizable to fit any need.

Getting Started

Quill is easy to set up. Here is a simple example to get you started:

<div id="editor">
  <p>Hello World!</p>
</div>

Formats

Quill supports many formats out of the box:

  • Bold and italic text
  • Underlined and strikethrough text
  • Inline code and code blocks
  • Subscript like H2O and superscript like E=mc2

Lists

Both ordered and unordered lists are supported:

  1. First ordered item
  2. Second ordered item
  3. Third ordered item

Blockquotes

This is a blockquote. It can contain formatted text and even links.
